Text:
Why can't you? ;) It's not hard, just join a private tracker, get the releases, behave nicely there so you don't get banned, have a fast connection, unrar them and upload here.

I'm free mondays, fridays and weekends currently from 22 - ~06 GMT, could do one more show on wednesdays, maybe one more show on tuesdays, but thursdays are totally booked. Get back to me if any of those air at a time I could do them.
